name: BIOFUEL
description:
The game is a space adventure based on the encounter of random events, taking back the choices of closed answer a bit like “Reigns”. The goal of the game is to manage its main resource, the “Biofuel”, a resource with many uses, as fuel and an exchange object. It is up to you to manage your choices, so that your meter does not drop to zero!

This game was made during the ludum dare 44 by a team of 4 students .
_Antoine Cuvilliez
_Pierre Morreel
_Clémentine Laurent
_Pierre Cilluffo
